methods.name: download_furniture_images
methods.description: Downloads luxury furniture images from web
methods.gene_output: CHAIR, TABLE, SOFA objects with "luxurious" modifiers

methods.name: generate_furniture_gene
methods.description: Creates GENE code for comfortable, elegant furniture
methods.gene_template: CHAIR > seat > cushion soft ergonomic comfortable

methods.name: download_nature_images
methods.description: Downloads plants, trees, natural landscapes
methods.gene_output: TREE, PLANT, FLOWER with "organic natural" modifiers

methods.name: generate_nature_gene
methods.description: Creates asymmetric, organic GENE code for plants
methods.gene_template: TREE > trunk > cylinder upward 800cm diameter 50cm wood organic

methods.name: download_vehicle_images
methods.description: Downloads cars, aircraft, boats, motorcycles
methods.gene_output: CAR, AIRCRAFT, BOAT with "aerodynamic sleek" modifiers

methods.name: generate_vehicle_gene
methods.description: Creates streamlined GENE code for vehicles
methods.gene_template: CAR > body > blob forward 400cm aerodynamic smooth sleek

methods.name: convert_to_precision_3d
methods.description: Converts images to high-poly precision 3D models
methods.gene_output: TOOL, DEVICE, MACHINE with "precise sharp" modifiers

methods.name: generate_industrial_gene
methods.description: Creates precise GENE code for tools and electronics
methods.gene_template: TOOL > handle > cylinder precise measured metal sharp

methods.name: convert_to_artistic_3d
methods.description: Converts images to stylized artistic 3D models

methods.name: generate_artistic_gene
methods.description: Creates expressive GENE code for art pieces
methods.gene_template: SCULPTURE > form > blob organic artistic expressive unique

methods.name: create_skeletal_layer
methods.description: Generates medical-grade skeletal structures

methods.name: create_muscular_layer
methods.description: Generates muscle groups with attachment points
methods.gene_template: HUMAN_BODY > muscular > biceps blob attach humerus flesh soft

methods.name: create_vascular_layer
methods.description: Generates blood vessel networks
methods.gene_template: HUMAN_BODY > vascular > aorta cylinder diameter 2.5cm blood flowing

methods.name: create_organ_layer
methods.description: Generates internal organs with realistic shapes
methods.gene_template: HUMAN_BODY > organ > heart blob 12cm attach ribs position center

methods.name: create_skin_layers
methods.description: Generates dermis and epidermis with pores
methods.gene_template: HUMAN_BODY > epidermis > covering thickness 0.5mm skin tone medium

methods.name: build_gene_editor_page
methods.description: Creates web interface for GENE code editing

methods.name: optimize_batch_processing
methods.description: Automates conversion of 47K objects to GENE

methods.name: build_cost_dashboard
methods.description: Creates cost comparison dashboard

methods.name: calculate_meshy_budget
methods.description: Optimizes Meshy AI usage for budget

methods.name: apply_visual_styling
methods.description: Applies beautiful CSS to web pages

methods.name: generate_garment_gene
methods.description: Creates GENE code for clothing items
methods.gene_template: SHIRT > fabric > surface flowing draped elegant tailored

methods.name: generate_building_gene
methods.description: Creates GENE code for buildings and structures
methods.gene_template: BUILDING > walls > wall upward 300cm concrete insulated structural

methods.name: design_floor_plan
methods.description: Generates room layouts with GENE
